name: RECONCILIATION
description:
Search and destroy all three generators to open the energy shield on the drill, and enter the hatch to destroy it from within.

----------

My first game in Unreal Engine 4. Made in about 3-4 months while also learning how to use the engine. All 3D assets and animations are made by me

--------

The game came out pretty difficult... Don't forget to use Q & E to fly and F to dash, to avoid the explosions

Don't let too many enemies build up, the game might start lagging
